1.content:
As I pulled up into your drive way, I began to debate rather or not I should just turn around and go back home. I mean, after all, we never really got along, not after I took the part-time job that you so badly wanted. You deserved the job way more than I did, but I kissed ass just so I could rub it in your face as school. I was that much of a douche bag to you, that I definitely deserve what you're about to put me through.

Deciding to give it a chance, I turned the engine off to my car and stepped out. "Just get this over with, Billy..." I said to myself as I began making my way up your front steps and knocked on the door. Waiting for you to answer, I pulled my cell phone out from my pocket and began examining through my text messages, smiling as I read my girlfriend's previous text she sent me. Unfortunately for her, that was the last time she'd ever talk to me again.

As you opened the front door, I gave you a fake smile as I slipped my cell phone back into my pocket and parted my lips to speak. "Uh, hi. You invited me...so....happy birthday." I said as you signaled for me to enter your house. This would be the last time I'll ever be a free man again. Walking inside, I heard you smirk and close the door behind you and lock it, but didn't think too much of it. Glancing around your house, I walked over and sat down on a chair. "Nice place." I said softly.

You entered the kitchen and began to poor me a drink of punch. However, you ended up slipping a shrinking pill inside of it and allowed it to dissolve before steering it around and handing me the cup. "Thanks." I said under my breath as I began drinking the cup. Little by little. After I finished, the shrinking pill immediately started taking effect as I dropped the glass and ran towards the bathroom. I began coughing as I slammed the door behind me and felt light headed. You just stood there behind the door grinning the entire time.

Everything around me began to grow bigger and bigger until I shrank into a pile of my own clothes. I heard the boom around of foot steps as you opened the door and kicked the pile of clothes out of the way and glanced down at me. I gasped and tried to take off running, but was unable to get away due to how small I was. You picked me up in your fist and brought me to your grinning face for you to explain why you shrunk me and what you plan to do to me.

The question is, how small did you shrink me?

1.title: The day that I shrank

info.description:
In this roleplay interactive story, you invited me to your birthday party, with only one intention. To shrink me and get pay back for humiliating you in class. Feel free to put me through hell! Be as disgusting and perverted towards me as you possibly can! I'm nothing but a toy for YOU to use and abuse!

RULES AND GUIDELINES ARE AS FOLLOWS:
The story should be written in first-person action. (EX: I gasp as I watched you begin to lower your bare foot down on top of me).
Each response you write should be AT LEAST a paragraph long at a minimum. I will delete any one-line or semi-para replies.
Do NOT add to anybody else's storylines. There will be plenty of chances for you to join in on humiliating tiny me, don't worry!
Do NOT control my character's actions or words. That's MY job. You control your own character's actions and words!
With each chapter, there should only be ONE choice option, so it goes in only one direction. I will edit any new posts with multiple options.
You can play as yourself, or create your own character. Male, female, shemale, femboy, ect. It doesn't matter to me what your gender is.
Death CAN be involved, but wait at least a long while before killing me off, or we could have it to where I'm indestructible so I can't die.
Please be sure to use proper spelling and grammar. With that said, please use the spell check before submitting your post.


NOTE: I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO DELETE AND/OR EDIT ANY NEW POST YOU MAKE THAT VIOLATES ANY OF THE GUIDELINES LISTED ABOVE. AS LONG AS YOU FOLLOW THEM, THERE WON'T BE ANY DELETION OR EDITED POSTS. THANKS IN ADVANCE!
